trans-unit.source: Provides a base class that exposes an element to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 提供將元素公開至使用者介面自動化的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: When [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries the root of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application about an element, the root returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer for that element.
trans-unit.target: 當[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]查詢的根[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]項目的相關的應用程式，會傳回根[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]對等項目。

trans-unit.source: The peer also responds to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries about its corresponding element.
trans-unit.target: 對等電腦也會回應[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]其對應的項目相關的查詢。

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when they are called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 當衍生類別的建構函式呼叫基本類別值時，提供基本類別值的初始設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> that is reported to the automation client as a source for all the events that come from this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />，其報告至自動化用戶端，作為所有來自此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> that is the source of events.
trans-unit.target: 為事件來源的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 對等相關聯之元素的快速鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: 快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: 快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: If an application responds to keyboard events to provide shortcut key behavior, it should return a string that contains the keyboard shortcut combination.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式回應鍵盤事件來提供快速鍵行為，則應該傳回字串，包含鍵盤快速鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: For example, for an element that can copy text to the clipboard, this attached property might be set to the value "CTRL+C".
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以將文字複製到剪貼簿的項目，此附加的屬性可能會設定為"CTRL + C"的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與自動化對等相關聯之項目的存取金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the access key.
trans-unit.target: 包含便捷鍵的字串。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the access key.
trans-unit.target: 包含便捷鍵的字串。

trans-unit.source: An access key (sometimes referred to as a keyboard shortcut or mnemonic) is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that invokes the associated menu function.
trans-unit.target: 中的功能表、 功能表項目或例如叫用相關的功能表函式的按鈕控制項的標籤文字的字元 （有時稱為鍵盤快速鍵或助憶鍵） 的存取金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For example, to provide a shortcut way to open the `File` menu (for which the access key is typically F), an element might have this attached property set to "ALT+F".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要提供快顯的方式來開啟`File`功能表 （適用於存取金鑰通常是 F），項目可能會有這個附加的屬性設定為"ALT + F"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 對等相關聯之元素的控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" /> of the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與自動化對等個體相關聯項目的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" />。

trans-unit.source: The identifier.
trans-unit.target: 識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自動化識別項的值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定該屬性，這個值是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 包含識別項的字串。

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自動化識別項的值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定該屬性，這個值是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> object that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 物件，這個物件表示與自動化對等個體關聯之項目的螢幕座標。

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 週框。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 週框。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> elements that are represented in the UI Automation tree as immediate child elements of the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> 項目的集合，這些項目在使用者介面自動化樹狀目錄中是表示為自動化對等個體的直系子項目。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a name that is used with <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType" />, to differentiate the control that is represented by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType" /> 一起使用的名稱，以區分此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 所表示的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: 類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: 類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> on the element that is associated with the automation peer that responds to a mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 取得與自動化對等個體關聯之項目上的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />，該對等個體回應滑鼠點選動作。

trans-unit.source: A point in the clickable area of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的可點選區域中的點。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element represents a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, a clickable point is any point in the visible client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that issues the command that the button represents when it is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果項目代表<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，可點選的點是可見的工作區中的任何點<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>發行按鈕表示按下滑鼠時的命令。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A point within the clickable area of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的可點選區域中的點。

trans-unit.source: Gets text that describes the functionality of the control that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字，這個文字描述與自動化對等個體關聯之控制項的功能。

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: 說明文字。

trans-unit.source: The returned string typically provides the same text that is provided by the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的字串通常會提供相同的文字所提供的工具提示控制項。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: 說明文字。

trans-unit.source: Tells [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] where in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree to place the <see langword="hwnd" /> being hosted by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 告知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 樹狀結構中的何處放置 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 項目所主控的 <see langword="hwnd" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the hosted <see langword="hwnd" /> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host <see langword="hwnd" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會針對主控 <see langword="hwnd" /> 物件的控制項，將主控 <see langword="hwnd" /> 傳回給 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the hosted `hwnd` to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host `hwnd` objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會針對主控 `hwnd` 物件的控制項，將主控 `hwnd` 傳回給 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that is associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must override this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>立即裝載的項目與相關聯`hwnd`必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If this method is not overridden, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] places the `hwnd` as a child element of the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> that hosts the whole application.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法不會覆寫，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]放置`hwnd`為的子元素<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>裝載整個應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you want to override this default behavior and set [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to position the hosted `hwnd` parallel to the place where it is located in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您要覆寫此預設行為，並設定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]定位託管`hwnd`平行它所在的位置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]邏輯樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Except in hosting scenarios, do not allow <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> types to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 除非在裝載案例中，不允許<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>覆寫這個方法的型別。

trans-unit.source: In addition to overriding this method, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> types that are associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must return the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that is cast to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple> in response to WM_GETOBJECT coming to the hosted `hwnd`.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，除了<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>立即裝載的項目相關聯的型別`hwnd`必須傳回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>轉型成<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>回應傳給裝載WM_GETOBJECT`hwnd`.

trans-unit.source: To get a pointer to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的指標<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets text that conveys the visual status of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字，這個文字表示與此自動化對等個體關聯之項目的視覺化狀態。

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: 狀態。

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact might be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: 例如，「 忙碌 」 或 「 上線 」，可能是 messenger 連絡人的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: 狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes what kind of item an object represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，這個字串描述物件所表示的項目類型。

trans-unit.source: The kind of item.
trans-unit.target: 項目種類。

trans-unit.source: Examples of the returned string are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: 傳回之字串的範例是 「 郵件訊息 」、 「 連絡人 」 和 「 文件 」。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The kind of item.
trans-unit.target: 項目種類。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> that is targeted to the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得以該項目為目標之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.
trans-unit.target: 項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> 為<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> 的目標。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method gets the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果項目，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>方法取得<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: In the following image, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> "Themes" is targeted to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>; therefore the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> also targets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 在下圖<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>「 主題 」 的目標為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>; 因此<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>也為目標<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: When the user presses **ALT**+**T**, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> gets focus instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按**ALT**+**T**、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>取得焦點，而不是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>。

trans-unit.source: ![Display properties shows labeled by usage](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "Display properties shows labeled by usage")
trans-unit.target: ![顯示屬性顯示用法所標記的](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "顯示用法所標記的顯示屬性")

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer> returns the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer> for the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer>對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>。

trans-unit.source: This enables an automation client to get the text string that describes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓 automation 用戶端取得文字字串描述<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.
trans-unit.target: 項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> 為<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> 的目標。

trans-unit.source: Gets the notification characteristics of a live region that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 Automation Peer 建立關聯的即時區域通知特性。

trans-unit.source: The notification characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 通知特性。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the derived implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSettingCore>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫衍生的實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSettingCore>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the notification characteristics of a live region.
trans-unit.target: 於衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回即時區域的通知特性。

trans-unit.source: Called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLiveSetting" /> 方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The notification characteristics of a live region.
trans-unit.target: 即時區域的通知特性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable localized string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType" /> value for the control that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得人們可解讀的當地語系化字串，這個字串表示與這個自動化對等個體相關聯控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的類型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets text that describes the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字，這個文字描述與此自動化對等個體關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: The name.
trans-unit.target: 名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the derived implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫衍生的實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: 包含標籤的字串。

trans-unit.source: You can think of this value as a string that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將此值視為使用者用來說明他們要參考控制項的字串。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by tools such as Narrator to tell the user what the control is.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可由工具，例如 [朗讀程式] 來告訴使用者控制項是什麼。

trans-unit.source: For example, a button with a string "OK" should return "OK".
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用字串 [確定] 按鈕應該會傳回 [確定]。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control that lets users select a color might return "Colors".
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>控制項，讓使用者選取一個色彩可能會傳回"Colors"。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you have assigned a name to all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that accessibility tools such as screen readers can refer to each control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您已在所有的控制項指派名稱[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，讓協助工具，例如螢幕助讀程式可以參考到每個控制項，以當地語系化的方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the explicit control orientation, if any.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示明確的控制項方向 (若有的話)。

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的方向。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的方向。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> that is the parent of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />，它是這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 的父代。

trans-unit.source: The parent automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 父自動化對等個體。

trans-unit.source: A value from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface" /> 列舉中的值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the control pattern that is associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得與指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface" /> 相關聯的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: The object that implements the pattern interface; <see langword="null" /> if this peer does not support this interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作模式介面的物件；如果此對等個體不支援這個介面則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The position on the screen to get the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> from.
trans-unit.target: 要從該處取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 的螢幕位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> from the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 從指定之點取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定的點的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The position on the screen to get the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> from.
trans-unit.target: 要從該處取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 的螢幕位置。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called from <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint(System.Windows.Point)" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，從 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint(System.Windows.Point)" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定的點的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer currently has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示與這個自動化對等個體相關聯的項目目前是否有鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示項目有鍵盤焦點，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示項目有鍵盤焦點，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Triggers recalculation of the main properties of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> and raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged" /> notification to the Automation Client if the properties changed.
trans-unit.target: 觸發重新計算 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 的主要屬性，並在屬性變更時引發對自動化用戶端的 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged" /> 通知。

trans-unit.source: Examples of main properties include, but are not limited to, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 主要屬性的範例包括但不限於，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, updates and notifications happen automatically after the update of the layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，更新和通知，會自動在版面配置更新之後[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: (The update occurs in response to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event.) Sometimes, however, properties change without raising the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event.
trans-unit.target: (為了回應進行更新<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>事件。)有時候，不過，屬性變更而不會引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, when the whole <xref:System.Windows.Window> moves, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當整個<xref:System.Windows.Window>移動，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the set of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A> objects change because the objects are expressed in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，一組<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>物件變更，因為這些物件會以螢幕座標表示。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> must call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.InvalidatePeer%2A> on its peer on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Window>必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.InvalidatePeer%2A>其對等端上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示與此 Automation Peer 相關聯的項目是否包含呈現給使用者的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目是內容項目則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A content element contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 內容項目包含呈現給使用者的資料。

trans-unit.source: An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button in a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 舉例來說，內容項目是清單方塊中的項目或在對話方塊中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: You typically use non-content elements (which are also referred to as peripheral elements) to work with the content in a composite control.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會使用非內容項目 （也稱為周邊項目） 搭配複合控制項中的內容。

trans-unit.source: An example of a non-content element is the button in a drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: 非內容元素的範例是在下拉式清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目是內容項目則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element is understood by the user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示項目會由使用者辨識為互動式，還是做為 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)] 中控制項的邏輯結構。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is a control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目是控制項則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is a control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目是控制項則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element associated with this automation peer supports interaction.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示與此自動化對等個體關聯的項目是否支援互動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element supports interaction; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目支援互動則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the automation peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果自動化對等個體可以接收及傳送事件，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> hosts <see langword="hwnds" /> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 相關聯的項目是否裝載 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中的 <see langword="hwnds" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> hosts <see langword="hwnds" /> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 相關聯的項目裝載 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中的 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see langword="hwnds" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two examples of elements that host `hwnds` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 裝載元素的兩個範例`hwnds`中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。

trans-unit.source: These peers must also override <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 也必須覆寫這些對等<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示項目是否可以接受鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目可以接受鍵盤焦點則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目可以接受鍵盤焦點則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an element is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示項目是否不在螢幕上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不在螢幕上則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會指出項目是否可見。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，項目會顯示在螢幕上，但仍看不到。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果項目但遮蔽其他項目在螢幕上時，它可能無法顯示。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目不在螢幕上則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element contains sensitive content.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示項目是否包含敏感性內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element contains sensitive content such as a password; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目包含敏感性內容 (如密碼) 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element contains sensitive content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目包含敏感性內容則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this peer must be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示與此對等個體關聯的項目在表單上是否為必填項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element must be completed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目為必填項則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm" /> 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is must be completed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目為必填項則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the specified event.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]是否正在接聽指定的事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="boolean" /> that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the event.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="boolean" />，表示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]是否正在接聽事件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you call this method before creating the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您呼叫這個方法建立之前<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>會引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is a performance measure because if [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] does not listen for the event, it does not make sense to create a peer to raise one.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是效能量值，因為如果[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]不會接聽事件，並不合理來建立來引發一個對等。

trans-unit.source: This method is static and only answers if a delegate listens for the specified event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], not for an event on a specific element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是靜態的只有答案委派中指定的事件接聽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]，不適用於特定的項目上的事件。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] can create broadcast listeners; therefore the per-element information is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 可以建立廣播接聽程式。因此每個項目資訊無關。

trans-unit.source: The class that implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple" />.
trans-unit.target: 會實作 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple" /> 的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple" /> proxy.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> Proxy 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple" /> proxy.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> Proxy 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple" />。

trans-unit.source: The automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 自動化對等個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得所指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The proxy.
trans-unit.target: Proxy。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> to raise the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AsyncContentLoadedEvent" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 呼叫以引發 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AsyncContentLoadedEvent" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The event identifier.
trans-unit.target: 事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: Raises an automation event.
trans-unit.target: 引發自動化事件。

trans-unit.source: The property that changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The previous value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的先前值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event to notify the automation client of a changed property value.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件，通知自動化用戶端已變更屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously resets the tree of child elements by calling <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore" />.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore" />，同步重設子項目的樹狀目錄。

trans-unit.source: Use this method in certain peer implementations that change the set of child elements in response to a call to a control pattern interface.
trans-unit.target: 在某些變更的控制項模式介面的呼叫的回應中的子項目集合的對等實作中使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: An example is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>, which can change the child elements of the peer by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>.
trans-unit.target: 範例是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>，這可以藉由移動變更之子項目的對等<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard focus on the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 對與此自動化對等個體關聯的項目設定鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus" /> 呼叫。
